name: Edible Pantries
description: This cocktail from Mark Brinker and Jessica Tessendorf of Chicago's Barrelhouse Flat is a tasty fall drink with a cognac base. Fernet Branca, maple syrup, and apple cider vinegar all contribute to the subtle complexity of the flavor, while cinnamon adds an autumnal aroma.
recipeIngredient: 1/8 ounce maple syrup (or slightly more to taste)
1/8 ounce apple cider vinegar (or slightly more to taste)

recipeInstructions.text: Combine cognac, Fernet Branca, maple syrup, apple cider vinegar, and bitters in rocks or old fashioned glass with cube of ice. Garnish with freshly grated cinnamon.
